Documents by KapitalWise

Getting Started Edit

Welcome to KapitalWise Goal API.

This API document is designed for those interested in developing for KapitalWise platform.

This API is still under development and will evolve.

You’ll succeed if you do this.

Here’s some useful information.

Something may not happen if you try and do this.

Something bad will happen if you do this.

Authentication Edit

You need to be authenticated for all API requests. You can request an API key by contacting us here.

Add the API key to all requests as a GET parameter.

Nothing will work unless you include this API key

 $.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
   alert(data);
 });

 curl http://api.kapitalwise.com/books?token=YOUR_APP_KEY

Errors Edit

Code Name Description
200 OK Success
201 Created Creation Successful
400 Bad Request We could not process that action
403 Forbidden We couldn’t authenticate you

All errors will return JSON in the following format:

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "error message here"
}

/users Edit

List all users on the basis of filters passed

Parameters
offset
Offset the results by this amount
limit
Limit the number of users returned
filter (like email, passcode, city etc.)
fields passed which acts as a filter to find user

This call will return a maximum of 100 users

Lists all the users in the system. You can paginate by using the parameters listed above.

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users?email=1@gmail.com", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

r = requests.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users?email=1@gmail.com", token="YOUR_APP_KEY")
print r.text

var request = require("request");
request("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users?email=1@gmail.com&&token=YOUR_APP_KEY", function (error, response, body) {
if (!error && response.statusCode == 200) {
  console.log(body);
}

curl http://api.kapitalwise.com/users?email=1@gmail.com

[
  { 
  "id": 3,
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030",
  "finWellScore": null,
  "goalSubscriptions":[{"id":1, "status": "ACTIVE"}],
  "accounts": [1, 2, 3]]
  },
  { 
  "id": 4,
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",

  "address2": "W 23rd Street",

  "finWellScore": null,

  "accounts": [4, 5, 6]
  }
]

  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid offset/limit"
}

/users Edit

Create User

Parameters
dateOfBirth
User's date of birth
firstName
User's first name
lastName
User's last name
address1
User's address line one
address2
User's address line two
state
User's state
city
User's city
zip
User's zip
email
User's email
phone
User's phone
ssn
User's social security number
passcode
Four digit passcode
password
Password
subBackupWithld
Is this user subjected to backup withholding
usResident
Is this user US resident
brokerDealerAff
Is this user affiliated to any broker dealer
boardMember
Is this user board member of a public listed company

The user will automatically be added and enabled

Adds a user to your collection.

$.post("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/", {
  "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030",
  "ssn": "152225201",
  "passcode": "3100",
  "password": "kap1talw1se"
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{ 
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User with this email already exists"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Known error"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid password"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid passcode"
}

/users/:id Edit

Get User

Returns a specific user from the system

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/3", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{ 
  "id": 3,
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030",
  "finWellScore": null,
  "goalSubscriptions":[{"id":1, "status": "ACTIVE"}],
  "accounts": [1, 2, 3]
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn't exist"
}

/users/:id Edit

Update User

Parameters
dateOfBirth
User's date of birth
firstName
User's first name
lastName
User's last name
address1
User's address line one
address2
User's adress line two
state
User's state
city
User's city
zip
User's zip
email
User's email
phone
User's phone
ssn
User's social security number
passcode
Four digit passcode
password
Password
subBackupWithld
Is this user subjected to backup withholding
usResident
Is this user US resident
brokerDealerAff
Is this user affiliated to any broker dealer
boardMember
Is this user board member of a public listed company

Update an existing user in the system.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/3",
  "type": "PUT",
  "data": {
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
}
});

{ 
  "id": 3,
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030",
  "finWellScore": null,
  "goalSubscriptions":[{"id":1, "status": "ACTIVE"}],
  "accounts": [1, 2, 3]
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn't exist"
}

/users Edit

Updates the user on the basis of filters passed as query parameters

Parameters
firstName
User's first name
lastName
User's last name
email
User's email
password
Password

The user will automatically be added and enabled

Adds a user to your collection.

$.put("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users?passcode=1234567", {
  "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Doe",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "password": "pass123"
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

[{ 
  "id": 3,
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030",
  "finWellScore": null,
  "goalSubscriptions":[{"id":1, "status": "ACTIVE"}],
  "accounts": [1, 2, 3]
}]

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User with this email already exists"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Known error"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid password"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid passcode"
}

/users/:id Edit

Deletes a user

Deletes a user in the system.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/3",
  "type": "DELETE",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "status": "deleted"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn't exist"
}

/users/:id/goals Edit

Recommended financial goals for a user

Returns a set of goal recommendations for the user based on the next best action algorithm. We consider the user’s current financial habits and spending patterns to recommend the set of goals that the user would want to save towards.

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/123/goals", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

 [
 {
  "id": 1,
  "goal": {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Emergency Savings",
      "description": "Your recommended Emergency Savings is intended to help you prepare for unexpected expenses. Depending on the assets you've, we recommend having between 3-6 months of your annual household income set aside for emergencies",
      "iconUrl": "https://www.cdn.kapitalwise.com/bin-public/060_www_kw_com/images/goal_thumb1.jpg"
  },
  "user": 201,
  "target": 22500.00,
  "status": "ACTIVE",
  "isDefault": false
  },
  {
  "id": 2,
  "goal": {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Paydown Credit Card Balance",
      "description": "Credit card debt can put a serious drag on your net worth. If you have high interest credit card debt or several different credit card bills to pay every month, it can make a lot of sense to take advantage of a 0% APR balance transfer offer as well.",
       "iconUrl": "https://www.cdn.kapitalwise.com/bin-public/060_www_kw_com/images/goal_thumb2.jpg"
  },
  "user": 201,
  "target": 3500.00,
  "status": "ACTIVE",
  "isDefault": false
  },
  {
  "id": 3,
  "goal": {
      "id": 7,
      "name": "Custom Goal",
      "description": "Persoanl goal to do something, get something or go somewhere ",
      "iconUrl": "https://www.cdn.kapitalwise.com/bin-public/060_www_kw_com/images/goal_thumbx.jpg"
  },
  "user": 201,
  "target": 0.00,
  "status": "ACTIVE",
  "isDefault": true
  }
  ]

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Could not recommend any goal"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Something went wrong on server-side"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn\'t exist"
}

/users/:id/savingInsights Edit

Saving insights for a user

Parameters
offset
Offset the results by this amount
limit
Limit the number of objects returned

Returns an array of timely (eg. weekly) savings made by the user

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/123/savingInsights?offset=0&limit=10", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

 {
   "user":123,
   "savingInsights": [
     {
        "id": 1,
        "amount": 225.00,
        "asOfDate": "2019-04-07T18:30:00.000Z"
      },
      {
         "id": 2,
         "amount": 736.00,
         "asOfDate": "2019-04-014T18:30:00.000Z"
      }
    ]
  }

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "No saving insight found"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Something went wrong on server-side"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn\'t exist"
}

/users/:id/devices Edit

Adds a device to user

Parameters
make
device's make
model
device's model
token
device token

The device will be added

Adds a device to user

$.post("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/1/device", {
  "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  "make": "a",
  "model": "b",
  "token": "vr73afsjw8bjsbvjashfasfa"
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{ 
  "id": 3,
  "user": 1,
  "make": "a",
  "model": "b",
  "token": "vr73afsjw8bjsbvjashfasfa"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn't exist"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Something went wrong on server-side"
}

/accounts Edit

List all books

Parameters
offset
Offset the results by this amount
limit
Limit the number of accounts returned

This call will return a maximum of 100 accounts

Lists all the accounts in the system. You can paginate by using the parameters listed above.

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts/", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

r = requests.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts/", token="YOUR_APP_KEY")
print r.text

var request = require("request");
request("http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts?token=YOUR_APP_KEY", function (error, response, body) {
if (!error && response.statusCode == 200) {
  console.log(body);
}

curl http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts?key=YOUR_APP_KEY

[
  {
  "id": 3,
  "userId": 1223,
  "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D",
  "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
  "accountNumber": "XXXX4230",
  "nickname" : "My Chase Saving",
  "accountType":  "Saving",
  "accountSubType":  "FUNDING",
  "providerType":  "YODLEE",
  "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
  "password":  "ydltestpassword",
  "memo":  "Test memo",
  "status": "ACTIVE"
},
{
  "id": 4,
  "userId": 1224,
  "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GASWDCF3DD",
  "accountName":  "Chase Checking",
  "accountNumber": "XXXX4223",
  "nickname" : "My Chase Checking",
  "accountType":  "Checking",
  "accountSubType":  "FUNDING",
  "providerType":  "YODLEE",
  "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
  "password":  "ydltestpassword",
  "memo":  "Test memo",
  "status": "ACTIVE"
},
]

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid offset/limit"
}

/accounts Edit

Create User

Parameters
userId
The account owner.
externalId
The external id for the account. Yodlee, Plaid or bank's own id.
accountName
Account name
accountNumber
The masked account number for display
nickname
Account nick name
accountType
Type of account. Checking, saving, credit etc.
accountSubType
Sub type of account (Funding/None)
providerType
The account data provider. Yodlee, Plaid or banks
loginName
The login name if any
password
The password if any
memo
The memo

The account will automatically be added to the user

$.post("http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts/", {
  "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  "userId": 123,
  "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D",
  "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
  "accountNumber": "XXXX4230",
  "nickname" : "My Chase Saving",
  "accountType":  "Saving",
  "accountSubType":  "FUNDING",
  "providerType":  "YODLEE",
  "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
  "password":  "ydltestpassw",
  "memo": "chase account"
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "userId": 123,
  "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D",
  "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
  "accountNumber": "XXXX4230",
  "nickname" : "My Chase Saving",
  "accountType":  "Saving",
  "accountSubType":  "FUNDING",
  "providerType":  "YODLEE",
  "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
  "password":  "ydltestpassword",
  "memo":  "Test memo",
  "status": "ACTIVE"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid user"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid Provider"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid score"
}

/accounts/:id Edit

Get Account

Returns a specific account

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts/5", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "userId": 1223,
  "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D",
  "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
  "accountNumber": "XXXX4230",
  "nickname" : "My Chase Saving",
  "accountType":  "Saving",
  "accountSubType":  "FUNDING",
  "providerType":  "YODLEE",
  "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
  "password":  "ydltestpassword",
  "memo":  "Test memo",
  "status": "ACTIVE"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary query parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Requested account not found"
}

/accounts/:id Edit

Update account

Parameters
userId
The account owner.
externalId
The external id for the account. Yodlee, Plaid or bank's own id.
accountName
Account name
accountNumber
The masked account number for display
nickname
Account nick name
accountType
Type of account. Checking, saving, credit etc.
accountSubType
Sub type of account (Funding/None)
providerType
The account data provider. Yodlee, Plaid or banks
loginName
The login name if any
password
The password if any
memo
The memo

Update an existing account.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.myapp.com/accounts/3",
  "type": "PUT",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
    "userId": 123,
    "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D",
    "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
    "accountNumber": "XXXX4230",
    "nickname" : "My Chase Saving",
    "accountType":  "Saving",
    "accountSubType":  "FUNDING",
    "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
    "password":  "ydltestpassw",
    "memo": "chase account"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "userId": 123,
  "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D",
  "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
  "accountNumber": "XXXX4230",
  "nickname" : "My Chase Saving",
  "accountType":  "Saving",
  "accountSubType":  "FUNDING",
  "providerType":  "YODLEE",
  "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
  "password":  "ydltestpassword",
  "memo":  "Test memo",
  "status": "ACTIVE"
}

 {
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid user"
}

/accounts/:id Edit

Deletes an account

Deletes an account from the system

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts/3",
  "type": "DELETE",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "status": "deleted"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Account doesn't exist"
}

/accounts/:id/transactions Edit

Get Transactions of an account

Returns a specific account

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts/5", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
  "transactions": [
   {
    "id": 1, 
    "date": "2019-04-03T18:30:00.000Z"
    "amount": 60
   },
   {
    "id": 2, 
    "date": "2019-04-03T18:30:00.000Z"
    "amount": 50
   },
  ]
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "No transaction found"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Account doesn't exist"
}

/goals Edit

List all Goals

Parameters
offset
Offset the results by this amount
limit
Limit the number of goals returned

This call will return a maximum of 100 goals.

Lists all the goals in the system. You can paginate by using the parameters listed above.

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/goals", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

[
  {
  "id": 1,
  "name": "Emergency Savings",
  "description": "Your recommended Emergency Savings is intended to help you prepare for unexpected expenses. Depending on the assets you've, we recommend having between 3-6 months of your annual household income set aside for emergencies",
  "iconUrl": null,
  "status": "ACTIVE"
  },
  {
  "id": 2,
  "name": "Paydown Credit Card Balance",
  "description": "Credit card debt can put a serious drag on your net worth. If you have high interest credit card debt or several different credit card bills to pay every month, it can make a lot of sense to take advantage of a 0% APR balance transfer offer as well.",
  "iconUrl": null,
  "status": "ACTIVE"
  }
]

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid offset/limit"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Goal doesn't exist"
}

/goals/:id Edit

Get a goal

Returns a specific goal from the database

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/goals/123", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

  {
  "id": 1,
  "name": "Emergency Savings",
  "description": "Your recommended Emergency Savings is intended to help you prepare for unexpected expenses. Depending on the assets you've, we recommend having between 3-6 months of your annual household income set aside for emergencies",
  "iconUrl": null,
  "status": "ACTIVE"
  }

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Goal doesn't exist"
}

/goalSubscriptions Edit

Create a goal Subscription

Parameters
user
User id of the subscriber
goalSuggestion
The goal suggestion chosen by the user
description
User defined goal description
target
Target amount for the goal
goalPreferences
An array of user goal preference objects containing 'keyName' and 'value'

Lets User subscribe to a Goal.

$.post("http://api.kapitalwise.com/goalSubscriptions/", {
"token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
"goalSuggestion": "1",
"user": "201",
"description": "My Emergency Savings Goal",
"target": 22000.00,
"goalPreferences": [{"keyName": "ROUNDUP", "value": 100}]
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id": 5,
  "goalSuggestion": 1,
  "description": "My Emergency Savings Goal",
  "user": 201,
  "target": 22000.00,
  "startDate": "2018-07-17T18:30:00.000Z",
  "endDate": null
  "status": "ACTIVE"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Goal suggestion doesn't exist"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Goal suggestion doesn't belong to this user"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Something went wrong on server-side"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Rule doesn\'t exist"
}

/goalSubscriptions/:id Edit

Get a goal subscription

Returns a specific goal subscription from the database

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/goalSubscriptions/5", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id": 5,
  "goalSuggestion": 101,
  "rule": "ROUNDUP",
  "description": "My Emergency Savings Goal",
  "user": 201,
  "trackedAccounts":[1],
  "fundingAccount": 2,
  "goalAccount": 3,
  "target": 22000.00,
  "funded": 1020.00,
  "running": 0,
  "startDate": "2018-07-17T18:30:00.000Z",
  "endDate": null,
  "nudge": true,
  "status": "ACTIVE",
  "goalPreferences":[{"keyName": "ROUNDUP","value": "100"}]
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Goal Subscription doesn't exist"
}

/goalSubscriptions/:id Edit

Update Goal Subscription

Parameters
description
User defined decription for the goal
target
Target amount for the goal
status
ACTIVE/PAUSE
nudge
Whether the user wants to be nudged for funding approval
goalPreferences
An array of user goal preference objects containing 'keyName' and 'value'

Update an existing goal subscription in the database.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/goalSubscriptions/5",
  "type": "PUT",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
    "target": 22000.00,
    "status": "PAUSE",
    "nudge": false
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 5,
  "goalSuggestion": 1,
  "description": "My Emergency Savings Goal",
  "user": 201,
  "target": 22000.00,
  "startDate": "2018-07-17T18:30:00.000Z",
  "endDate": null
  "status": "PAUSE"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Goal subscription doesn't exist"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Goal subscription status is invalid"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "target amount is invalid"
}

/goalSubscriptions/:id Edit

Deletes a goal subscription

Deletes a goal subscription from the database.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/goalSubscriptions/123",
  "type": "DELETE",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 123,
  "status": "DELETED"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Goal subscription doesn't exist"
}

/goalSubscriptions/:id/transactions Edit

Get transaction logs which contributed to this goal

Returns transactions

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/goalSubscriptions/1/transactions", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id": 1,
  "transactions": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "accountId": 1,
      "accountName": "sc",
      "amount": 34,
      "roundup": 66,
      "date": "2019-04-03T18:30:00.000Z",
      "status": "PROCESSED"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "accountId": 1,
      "accountName": "sc",
      "amount": 45.5,
      "roundup": 54.5,
      "date": "2019-04-03T18:30:00.000Z",
      "status": "OPEN"
    }
  ]
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Goal Subscription doesn't exist"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "No transactions found"
}

/goalSubscriptions/:id/history Edit

Get funding history for the goal

Returns funding history

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/goalSubscriptions/1/history", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id": 1,
  "fundings": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "amount": 34,
      "asOfDate": "2019-04-03T18:30:00.000Z",
      "status": "PROCESSED"
    }
  ]
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Goal Subscription doesn't exist"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "No history of funding found"
}

/notifications Edit

Send a notification request to APNs

Parameters
user
User id
data
Data object to be sent as notification {has two keys value pair, 'aps' (as per APNs spec) and 'payload' (Any extra info other than aps)}
$.post("http://api.kapitalwise.com/notifications", {
"user": "1",
"data" : {
  "aps" : {
      "alert" : {
          "title" : "Game Request",
          "subtitle" : "Five Card Draw",
          "body" : "Bob wants to play poker"
      },
      "badge": 2
  },
  "payload": {
       "messageId": "ABWHEVDH"
  }
 }
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "sent": [
    {"device": "7e976aa46427841e58af2d05a9da"}
  ],
  "failed": []
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn\'t exist"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "No device is linked to user"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Something went wrong on server-side"
}
